topic.fullpath: Topic :: Software Development :: Agile development tools

name: Fosy.Net
short_description:
Project Fosy (Folder Syncronizer)

Fosy is (or will be) a tool for realtime folder syncronization.

BUT its not a backup tool! It can only handle folder and files without any
access restrictions.

Mainly it will be used by webdevelopers, to syncronize some changes from
a development folder, to a testing or productivity environment in real time.

There are some specials for web developers included.

  - A LESS compiler for compiling *.less files to *.css files at target folder.
  - A HTML file minifier for minify some *.html, *.htm, *.xhtml files at target folder
  - A JavaScript file minifier for minify some *.js files at target folder
  - Handlers for external program calls (binding to file name extension) to syncronize.
    If you getting or building a commandline program that e.g. minify some PHP-Code
    (or something else) you can use it by defining a handler for 'php' file name
    extension. The external programm must accept min. the 2 commandline arguments
summary: A realtime folder syncronizer for Windows
